title: Bug 124777 - Setting a blank tooltip in chart title causes exception during preview.
OB: When setting a blank tooltip in the chart title and attempting to preview, an exception is thrown.
EB: The software should handle a blank tooltip in the chart title without causing exceptions during preview.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new simple chart. 2. Add title interactivity by enabling mouse over/show tooltip. 3. Keep the tooltip text blank and click the 'Add' button.
